comment.author: 50178914@N06
comment._content: This is the Burnelli RB-2, copied after the first "Lifting Fuselage" aircraft ever built and the largest transport plane of its time, the RB-1. The RB-1 has dual tire landing gear. The RB-2 has single tires and says Remington Burnelli 2 on the tail. See more here: www.burnelliaircraft.com/
